text: Nabii Muusah tawraat lucwal madqoogqik israa-iil xaylo kah ceyitti ittam kassis kee kulliimih baxxaqqa addal kak tani nuktube, tokkel Muusaw tawraat kitab hirgitaay maqar luk Yallih taaqatal kaal ingicilliyaay ku mara diggi ittaah tayseemil kaak taamitaanamal ken amris, uma maray Yallih amrik yewqeh dabqi sin aybulleeyyo Akeeral kaak iyye Yalli
